docs.description: The United Nations Commodity Trade Statistics Database (UN Comtrade) stores more than 1 billion trade data records from 1962. Over 140 reporter countries provide the United Nations Statistics Division with their annual international trade statistics detailed by commodities and partner countries. These data are subsequently transformed into the United Nations Statistics Division standard format with consistent coding and valuation using the UN/OECD CoprA internal processing system.

docs.description:
Pupils of the official school age. Pre-primary. Total is the total number of pre-primary students who are of the official pre-primary school age. NOTE: These values are not ‘capped’ i.e. the values are not necessarily the numerators used to calculate the net enrolment rates (for cases that are capped). To obtain the numerator for the NER, you can simply multiply the SAP of a relevant level by its corresponding NER.
Pupils of the official school age.  Pre-primary.  Total
docs.name: United Kingdom: Pupils of the official school age.  Pre-primary.  Total
